title:
On the monoid of order-preserving transformations of a finite chain
  whose ranges are intervals
abstract:
In this note we give a presentation for the monoid $IO_n$ of all
order-preserving transformations of a $n$-chain whose ranges are intervals. We
also consider the submonoid $IO_n^-$ of $IO_n$ consisting of order-decreasing
transformations, for which we determine the cardinality, the rank and a
presentation.
